list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: strike (a person or an animal) repeatedly and violently so as to hurt or injure them, typically with an implement such as a club or whip.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: if we were caught we were beaten
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Nếu chúng ta bị bắt, chúng ta đã bị đánh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: defeat (someone) in a game or other competitive situation.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she beat him easily at chess
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô ấy dễ dàng đánh bại anh ta tại Cờ vua

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: succeed in getting somewhere ahead of (someone).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the goalie beat him to the ball
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Thủ môn đánh anh ta vào quả bóng

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: her heart beat faster with panic
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Trái tim cô đập nhanh hơn với sự hoảng loạn

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a bird) move (the wings) up and down.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: doves wheel around the rooftops, beating their wings
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Bánh xe bồ câu xung quanh mái nhà, đánh đôi cánh của họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: stir (cooking ingredients) vigorously with a fork, whisk, or beater to make a smooth or frothy mixture.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: beat the butter until light and fluffy
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đánh bơ cho đến khi ánh sáng và mịn màng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: sail into the wind, following a zigzag course with repeated tacking.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: we beat southward all that first day
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đánh bại về phía nam tất cả những ngày đầu tiên

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a main accent or rhythmic unit in music or poetry.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the glissando begins on the second beat
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Glissando bắt đầu trong nhịp thứ hai

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the movement of a bird's wings.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the beat of the swallow's wings as they dive after midges
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: nhịp đập của đôi cánh của Swallow khi họ lặn sau những midges

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an area allocated to a police officer to patrol.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: public clamor for more police officers on the beat
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Kỷ niệm công khai cho nhiều sĩ quan cảnh sát trên nhịp

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a brief pause or moment of hesitation, typically one lasting a specified length.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she waited for a beat of three seconds
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô chờ đợi một nhịp gồm ba giây

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I'm beat—I need an hour or so to rest
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đang đánh tôi cần một giờ hoặc lâu hơn để nghỉ ngơi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: relating to the beat generation or its philosophy.
